features: DAILY BEAUTY GO-TO: Anytime you need to replenish skin moisture use MR.A Rose&Jasmine Water. Natural hydrosol pure and mild, which can be used safely inclouding eyes area. Also can be sprayed on hair to clean scalp and strengthen hair roots. This botanical based mist refreshing facial and body mist that can be used any time of day!

NATURAL TONER AND FACIAL MIST: MR.A Rose&Jasmine Water Spray fomulated with natural ingredients without dyes or alcohol; vegan & cruelty-free. With a delicate aroma, it soothes skin, refines the look of pores and energizes the body while enhancing the benefits of your personal treatment regimen

REFRESH YOUR SKIN WITH TURMERIC & VC: MR.A Rose&Jasmine Water specially added turmeric and vitamin C ingredients. Rose Water cooling, refreshing and helps reduce redness. Jasmine hydrosol has a conditioning effect on dry, dehydrated, eczema, inflamed, oily or sensitive skin. Turmeric has calming and anti-inflammatory properties. Supplementing the skin with vitamin C can promote metabolism and improve the skin’s immunity.
FOR ALL SKIN TYPE: Suitable for all skin type. MR.A Rose Water Facial Spary with turmeric and vitamin C. No chemical addition. Effectively balance skin PH.
HOW TO USE: Spray a generous amount of mist onto the face and neck after cleansing. Massage to absorb. Also can use as emergency hydration
body.description: MR.A Rose & Jasmine Water effectively moisture and balance skin PH.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars fragrant water sprays plus more...
reviews.reviewText: Both the Jasmine and Rose water spray smell terrific without being overpowering - I can't even decide which one I like more :). But that's not all - they also contain Vit. C and Turmeric - two wonderful ingredients. Besides the Rose and Jasmine Water, on the ingredient list there is also Tranexamic Acid - which was a new name for me, so I looked it up and it's actually great for your skin (!). And there is Glycerin too, which is a known component of many skin products. So there you go - good, safe ingredients and lovely fragrance. Plus, it feels very refreshing on my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have mixed feelings about this product. It arrives as you see it... unsecured (no tamper-proof wrapping of sort) and a little messy. During shipment, it must have leaked. The bottles were both sticky and damp. I still really wanted to try the product... I tested it on my skin for 4 hrs and experienced no issues. However, the scent was just ok... diluted. Once you spray it, the smell is not that great, but once it settles, it actually smells a little better. Between the Jasmine and Rose, I prefer the Rose in overall scent, but I'm not really fond of either. I don't really like how it feels on my skin. It left a feeling of "product" on my skin. I was hoping for something that is more pure and clean. After a few minutes as it sets on my skin, that "product" feeling actually dissipates... the scent of Jasmine and Rose come through more clear. It sprays on clear. My feelings are very mixed. In all honesty, I'm not fond of either scent. I do like the simplicity of ingredients. I also wish it was packaged and shipped better amongst other things. For the current value for both bottles... it's fair. But then again, scent and value is all relative per each individual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Water Spray for Face
reviews.reviewText: This review is for "2 Pack Organic Turmeric VC Rose Water and Jasmine Water Spray for Face, Facial Mist to Replenish Water in Time, Moisturizing, Soothing and Repairing Skin, Toner Hydrating Spray 100ml*2"I think they need to remove the sprayer and have a regular cap and let the customer insert the sprayer. Mine arrived leaking which is very annoying. However, I still have used both and like them a lot. I like to apply my foundation and then spray it gently before blending it into my skin and I get a nice result. I also like to spray my face during the day as a little pick-me-up. At night before bed I like to spray my face and arms so I smell extra good as I fall sleep. I have not experienced any negative skin reactions. It's a simple and inexpensive product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Overwhelming fragrant. The product in theory would have been great. However disappointed as most of the contents escaped before getting to meUpdate: customer service is non existent. Contact and promised resolution but have not seen follow through. This company ignored me after initial contact of situation. 3 weeks after this contact, they ghosted me. A company who offers replacement and then doesn’t follow through is not a company who is built on good ethics. Things happen but communication is another important aspect of a good company. I have no desire or intention of continuing any further business with this type of company. Dishonest business practices and morals

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2 pack facial mist!!
reviews.reviewText: I recently used, 2 Pack Organic Turmeric VC Rose Water and Jasmine Water Spray for Face, Facial Mist to Replenish Water in Time, Moisturizing, Soothing and Repairing Skin, Toner Hydrating Spray 100ml*2 and here is what I thought of them. I liked these sprays a lot. They both smell amazing and I like that they can be used in a variety of ways from a facial mist to setting spray for makeup or even to make my hair smell good. I like that these came in a 2 pack and each has it own unique smell. I would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When I first opened the box and grabbed a bottle it felt damp and kind of tacky. I tried cleaning one of the bottles, thinking that maybe they were packaged in a box where a bottle had leaked. Unfortunately, the label came off and the bottle still felt weird. There wasn't a seal on the bottles either, which is a huge turn off for me.Given all of that I still wanted to try the product. They both smell pretty good but I really wanted to use them on my face. I placed one drop of pure glycerin in my hand then sprayed the rose water scented spray on my hand. I rubbed my hands together then applied it to my face. It did not feel tacky or sticky and my skin actually felt quite good. I followed that up with my regular facial moisturizer. My skin was soft, supple and felt elastic. I think the glycerin had more to do with how my skin felt than the spray.Since I really like the scent of both sprays I will probably use these on my hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The main ingredients are organic rose or jasmine water
reviews.reviewText: These floral sprays are simple and pretty. I prefer mild scents that won't overpower everyone's senses. These water sprays are gentle and mild. I tried the rose water on my wrist and hair and have had no adverse reaction. My water sprays came packaged together in a bubble wrap bag, inside the shipping box, which was a very good thing as the bottles leaked through the bag and into the box. It didn't damage the other things in the box. I just rinsed the bottles off and they don't leak now when sitting upright. I plan to share these with my adult daughter who lives with me and enjoys trying something new sometimes. I really appreciate the short list of ingredients in these sprays, mostly organic water, vitamin C and turmeric.

reviews.reviewerName: Sarah with an HSarah with an H
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Scented water, ok mist
reviews.reviewText: Not impressed. I was hoping to use these as a toner since that's in the description, but they don't rebalance the pH of my skin after washing (which is what a toner is supposed to do). If you want to spray water on your face for part of your routine, the scents are nice. The mist is kind of middle of the road, not super uneven, but not super fine either. One leaked a little in the packaging. I don't really think I would recommend these.
